Description
Los Santos - city of the sun, starlets and released in the circulation of the stars. Once the envy of the entire Western world, it is now a haven of crappy reality shows, suffocating in the grip of economic problems. In the center of the whole mess - completely different trio of criminals, trying desperately to catch the tail of luck in the ongoing struggle for a place under the sun. A former member of a street gang Franklin tries to engage with the past. A retired bank robber Michael discovers that an honest life is not so rosy as it seemed. Turned to violence crazy Trevor interrupted by one businessman to another in hope of winning the big jackpot. Having exhausted the options, the three put their own lives on the line and commit a series of daring robberies in which - or pan, or missing. In Grand Theft Auto V fans waiting for not only the most extensive and detailed world ever created by Rockstar Games, but also the opportunity to influence the lives and actions of three main characters. This interweaving stories of several characters will make the game the most fun and exciting. All attributes of the famous series of fully characterized and Grand Theft Auto V - here and incredible attention to detail, and the trademark black humor, ridicule and pop culture, and even brand new, incredibly ambitious multiplayer mode.

Installation:
1. Install the game by running Setup.exe
2. Set the Social Club v1.1.5.6 Setup.exe from the folder of the game

Note !!!
When you compress files used reflate, which is why the installation is very long, it was the only way to compress game archives.
Installation is divided into two parts, all the main files are installed in 30 minutes, rest of the time (4 hours or more) is spent on the restoration of game archives.
During installation, it is recommended not to touch anything and wait until you see the Finish button!
